“Color & Castle Wall” Cardiff, Wales. 11.5.2018 #Leica #LeicaCamera #LeicaCameraUSA #LeicaM #LeicaM10P #LeicaM10Ptyp3656 #Summilux #Summilux35mm #LeicaCraft #🔴📷 #MyLeicaJourney #MKexplore #drandallblythe #RatsEyesPhotography #HoneTheAesthetic

“Weihnachtsfeier mit Polizei” Vienna, Austria. 11.22.2018 Your Christmas party ain’t shit unless the riot police show up! Vienna goes big for Christmas- tons of decorations & Christmas markets. I was having a lovely time strolling through the city center when I heard the unmistakable sound of civil disobedience. That sound, which always drags my photographer’s eye & dissident’s soul (sorry-not-sorry-at-all, I just don’t like authority in general) towards it like sirens luring a sailor to his doom, brought me to a long line of exceedingly handsome policemen & beautiful policewomen (they make really good-looking cops in Austria, hahaha.) The cops were containing & moving a large group of whistle-blowing, chanting, sign-waving protesters. The protestors were filming the cops, the cops were filming the protesters, bystanders were filming both, & I was in the mix, completely confused & shooting photos of all of them- it was pretty damn meta. I was waiting for the tear gas to start so I could take evasive maneuvers (I love the smell of tear gas in the evening... smells like... victory), but everyone, cops & protesters alike, were impressively well-behaved, so I asked a cop with a camera on a pole what they were protesting about & he said (wait for it) “The government.” OF COURSE IT’S THE GOVERNMENT! WHAT ELSE COULD IT BE?!? I asked a protestor & he told me “Herr so-and-so from the government- have you heard of him?” Nope. Regardless, it was a very festive environment for a protest, & I quite enjoyed watching it, since no one (especially not me) got tear gassed or beaten with a night stick. Merry Christmas, y’all! “If your pictures aren’t good enough, you aren’t close enough”- Robert Capa #Leica #LeicaCamera #LeicaCameraUSA #LeicaM #LeicaM10P #LeicaM10Ptyp3656 #🔴📷 #Summilux #Summilux35mm #LeicaCraft #MyLeicaJourney #MKexplore #drandallblythe #RatsEyesPhotography #HoneTheAesthetic

“Into the Highlands” Rannoch Moor, Scotland. 11.11.2018. If I have a day off in Scotland, you can bet your last penny that I will be heading up into the Highlands- there is no other place like it on the face of the planet. Rannoch Moor is a vast, boggy moorland you pass through on the A82 heading towards to Glen Coe- it is quite desolate. The clouds were very low on this day, hiding the surrounding mountains, but it just added to the atmosphere. #Leica #LeicaCamera #LeicaCameraUSA #LeicaM #LeicaM10P #LeicaM10Ptyp3656 #🔴📷 #Elmarit #Elmarit28mm #LeicaCraft #MyLeicaJourney #MKexplore #drandallblythe #RatsEyesPhotography #HoneTheAesthetic

“La Jetée” Calais, France. 11.13.2018. Every time I take the ferry across the English Channel from Dover to Calais, I think about the evacuation of Dunkirk in May & June of 1940 during WWII. This is the story that the movie “Dunkirk” was based upon- Dunkirk is not far from Calais, about 20 miles northeast on the French Coast, & the majority of the English armed forces were pushed to the edge of the sea by the Nazis. The water was too shallow for the large British ships to come to shore, so about 850 private boats (known today as the “Little Ships of Dunkirk”) made the deadly journey across the sea to ferry the troops back to England. The French armed forces held the rear guard, allowing the troops to escape- many, many French died bravely, holding the line so that the English could escape. There was a breakwater in Dunkirk, long & narrow like the pier in this photo, & soldiers would line up on it to be picked up. While they stood there helplessly, German planes came to bomb & strafe them with machine gun fire, doing the same to the men lined up on the beach & even into the sea waiting to be rescued. If not for the Little Ships, many manned by British civilian crews, England would have fallen to Germany. The Little Ships, just regular old fishing boats & pleasure boats, evacuated over 300,000 trapped British & French soldiers. I’ve crossed that channel many times, riding comfortably on a giant ferry that carries my tour bus & even has a restaurant & bar, but I always stand on deck, no matter how cold or rainy it is, & I look out over the freezing water, & I am grateful that I don’t have to make the crossing in a tiny boat while planes drop death from the sky onto my head. Some of the actual Little Ships that made the crossing in 1940 are in the film “Dunkirk”– I recommend you watch it. History is IMPORTANT- pay attention to it, so you may guard today against the evils of the past- when people become mentally lazy, history has a bad habit of repeating itself... #Leica #LeicaCamera #LeicaCameraUSA #LeicaM #LeicaM10P #LeicaM10Ptyp3656 #🔴📷 #Summilux #Summilux50mm #LeicaCraft #MyLeicaJourney #MKexplore #drandallblythe #RatsEyesPhotography #HoneTheAesthetic

“Finally, Y’all Actually Look Good” Austria, Vienna. 11.22.2018 I was trying to shoot a photo of this long hallway at the Rathaus in Vienna & this couple about my age walked up & stood in my frame for about 5 minutes, taking selfie after selfie, checking & re-taking the photo & repositioning their faces, trying to make themselves not look fat or old or tired or whatever the fuck aspect of the reality of their actual existence it was they weren’t satisfied with. It was EXHAUSTING to watch. I see this all the time now, people (young & old) having these pseudo-photo shoots with themselves in public so they can try & portray themselves as having some goddamned glamorous perfect life on whatever social media they use. The level of public narcissism coupled with insecurity is sky-high these days, & it’s beyond obnoxious to me, especially when you’re in my damn way when I am trying to take a photo of something that is truly beautiful. NO ONE HAS A PERFECT LIFE. STOP FRONTING. If we’re LUCKY, we’re all gonna get old & wrinkled & our tits will sag & our hairlines will recede & you know what? IT’S BEAUTIFUL. This whole pursuit of unobtainable eternal youth is pathetic, & it’s just another scam to sell you stuff anyway. There are countless wrinkles on my face from smiling & there is gray in my stubble & there are scars all over my body from living full throttle for too many years, but I wouldn’t hide any of that stuff for all the money in the world- I earned it all. Anyway, eventually these two bozos finally got the shot they wanted, posted it, then walked away- at last, they became part of a truly beautiful picture, their receding asses providing a sense of scale their faces never could... #Leica #LeicaCamera #LeicaCameraUSA #LeicaM #LeicaM10P #LeicaM10Ptyp3656 #🔴📷 #Elmarit #Elmarit28mm #LeicaCraft #MyLeicaJourney #MKexplore #drandallblythe #RatsEyesPhotography #HoneTheAesthetic

“Rainy Days” Llandudno, Wales, 11.8.2018. The other day I went to the north coast of Wales- my friend @jj.janiak_discharge came & picked me up in Manchester & brought along @wainwright.roy, AKA Rainy, the bassist of @discharge.official. I got to know some of the Discharge guys when I toured with them during my tour of duty as the fill-in vocalist for the mighty EYEHATEGOD. Rainy is a founding member of Discharge- the band goes back to 1977. If you don’t know about Discharge, you need to educate yourself & immediately buy their classic 1982 album “See Nothing Hear Nothing Say Nothing.” The influence of that album on metal, punk, & hardcore as it exists today cannot be overstated- if you don’t believe me, look up interviews where Metallica, Slayer, Anthrax, & a billion other bands talk about that album’s influence. It was a great day by the sea with Rainy & JJ, then they got to see me do my thing with my regular band the next day in Manchester- this is the kind of thing that blows my mind sometimes, hanging out with & playing in front of the dudes who paved the way for me doing what I do, & whose music I have been listening to since I was just a snotty kid. Cheers Rainy & JJ- it was a pleasure! #Leica #LeicaCamera #LeicaCameraUSA #LeicaM #LeicaM10P #LeicaM10Ptyp3656 #Summilux #Summilux35mm #LeicaCraft #🔴📷 #MyLeicaJourney #MKexplore #drandallblythe #RatsEyesPhotography #HoneTheAesthetic

“The Crossing” Glen Coe, Scotland. 11.11.2018 I first went to the Highlands about 13 years ago with my girlfriend (now my wife.) I went on my band’s message board at the time & said “Attention fans- I’m coming to the U.K. with my girl on vacation. Does anyone have a couch we can crash on?” Several people responded, & we routed our trip through the U.K. around that– obviously that would be a complete nightmare today & would never work, but times were poorer (yet a lot simpler) then, so we just punk rocked it around England & Scotland. I made some really good friends that trip that I still keep in touch with to this day. One of those people was my buddy Gordon from Larkhall, Scotland. He carried me & my girl up into the Highlands, & every trip I’ve been there since has been with Gordon. On this one his Dad, John, drove- I’m friends with his whole family. We had a great ramble around Glen Coe, up to Signal Rock & then back down to my favorite pub for lunch. It was a great day for hiking over the River Coe. #Leica #LeicaCamera #LeicaCameraUSA #LeicaM #LeicaM10P #LeicaM10Ptyp3656 #🔴📷 #Elmarit #Elmarit28mm #LeicaCraft #MyLeicaJourney #MKexplore #drandallblythe #RatsEyesPhotography #HoneTheAesthetic

“British Grom of Steel” Birmingham, England, 11.07.2018. This is my buddy Rossi- I got to meet him in person for the first time the other night in Birmingham. Rossi is 8 years old- he was diagnosed with leukemia when he was just four years old, & has already dealt with more in his short life (chemo & operations & all that crap) than most adults ever will. Today, he is cancer free- amazing! I’ve been sending him a video message of encouragement or two over the last few years from time to time, but yesterday was the first time we got to kick it in person- he & his Mom watched our set from side stage, & I introduced him to some of the Slayer & Anthrax dudes. Rossi has a good heart (he actually started a foundation called Team Rossi to help other kids with cancer out), & he’s a fighter for sure- I was stoked to see him standing tall & proud, all handsome with his long hair (I think he’s gonna be a lady killer for sure when he grows up- watch out ladies!) I was also stoked to find out that he is a surfer too- one day we’re gonna have to catch a few waves together, little brah! I encourage everyone to go to WWW.BETHEMATCH.ORG & get on the bone marrow registry- I am, my wife is- you might just save someone’s life who has leukemia or other blood-related cancers. Good to meet ya in the flesh, Rossi- you’re a legend & we’re gonna have to rip some surf in Cornwall one day! 🤙🏼🤙🏼🤙🏼 #Leica #LeicaCamera #LeicaCameraUSA #LeicaM #LeicaM10P #LeicaM10Ptyp3656 #Summilux #Summilux35mm #LeicaCraft #🔴📷 #MyLeicaJourney #MKexplore #drandallblythe #RatsEyesPhotography #HoneTheAesthetic

“Stephansdom” Vienna, Austria. 11.22.2018. St. Stephen’s Cathedral is a stunning example of gothic architecture in the city center of Vienna. The initial building was completed in the year 1160 AD- seeing stuff like this always makes me wonder about the tradesmen who built these sorts of buildings so long ago, & reminds me of how (comparatively) young my own country is. I mean, can you imagine trying to put something like this together in medieval times, with no gas-powered cranes & forklifts & modern safety equipment? It’s freaking MASSIVE- the top of the church spire disappears into the mist. St. Stephens (& Vienna in general) is especially beautiful around Christmas time- I recommend a visit for all you fans of the holiday season. #Leica #LeicaCamera #LeicaCameraUSA #LeicaM #LeicaM10P #LeicaM10Ptyp3656 #🔴📷 #Elmarit #Elmarit28mm #LeicaCraft #MyLeicaJourney #MKexplore #drandallblythe #RatsEyesPhotography #HoneTheAesthetic

TOMORROW! SUNDAY NOVEMBER 11th! It’s the last day to see my show, “A Longer View”, at the @leicagalleryboston. If you’re in New England, pop by today or tomorrow & check it out (yes, the photos are for sale.) Thanks so much to everyone at @leicacamerausa, @leicastoreboston, & @leicagalleryboston, & @digitalsilverimaging for all the support & hosting my show- it was truly an honor! And thanks to everyone that bought a print- I am always happy to think about my work hanging in someone’s home or workplace, bringing them joy. This is one of the large prints (30x40) hanging in the show- shot in the cloud forest of Ecuador on a #LeicaSL. #Leica #LeicaCameraUSA #LeicaGalleryBoston #digitalsilverimaging #drandallblythe #alongerview #shootwithpurpose
